h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The next Mind Core is located along the Fright Cliff \- Squall Hideout Shrine path in Yellow Wind Ridge. From the Shrine, on your right, you can find a small hill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 6'.
The content is as follows:
The next Mind Core is located along the Fright Cliff \- Squall Hideout Shrine path in Yellow Wind Ridge. From the Shrine, on your right, you can find a small hill.
